name: Pure Gore (Sandbox&Playground)
description:
This game is a steam port







Pure Gore:


  • Tear things by connecting them with a rope joint to a launching rocket or car,
  • smash melons with heavy blocks or melee weapons
  • shredder tomato's inside of a grinder,
  • crush and torture onions with pistons
  • or shoot lemons with an AK-47!
  • or have fun with ragdolls

Ragdolls / Stickmans:

You have the possibility to create your stickman by connecting different body parts to each other! You could create a doll with multiple heads and legs, everything is possible!

Weapons & Explosives:

Pure gore offers over 20 weapons/explosives, like nukes, AK-47´s, bazookas, lasers, grenades, knifes, spears, implosions bombs, black hole bomb´s... Every weapon has a different shoot behavior and can be used to mutilate things.

Water Simulation:

The game is not just a people playground its also a water simulation! You can build boats, simulate water flow behavior, create tsunamis or let ragdoll´s bleed since blood is under the hood also liquid!
That means if they get hurt they will start to bleed.
JOINTS: Joints or Connectors can be used to build complex vehicles, buildings or machinery. You could build for example a grinder on wheels or ships, tanks... The game offers different joints like ropes, pistons, bolts, motors...

More Features:


  • Tools: useful utilities, like detonators, erasers, gravity changers...
  • Nature: build Terrains, create natural disasters (tsunami, tornado, meteors, wind, earthquake...),
  • highly configurable: many sandbox elements can be customized (change color, adjust timers and more)
  • Physically objects like building materials, thrusters, black holes, balloons, glue, wheels, decoration...
  • offline game. No internet connection needed
  • great and realistic „Box2D“ physics
  • save the whole sandbox or just creations


If you have any suggestions or problems, then join my discord or write me an email.
